author: Staff Reporter
text:
As many as 12 bullock carts have been seized in and around Cheyyar on Saturday for smuggling sand.

Cheyyar police seized these vehicles at Cheyyar Koda Nagar, Koda Nagar Pump House and Arugavur-Karkanthangal areas near the river.
title: 12 bullock carts seized for smuggling sand
